title: DR Congo and Rwanda Leaders Set for Washington Peace Talks Amid Rising Tensions
description: The presidents of the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) and Rwanda are expected to travel to Washington next week for high-level peace discussions with U.S. President Donald Trump, according to multiple sources cited by Reuters.
